thread.title: BRIEF-Global Payments Reports Q1 Adjusted Earnings Per Share $1.13

title: BRIEF-Global Payments Reports Q1 Adjusted Earnings Per Share $1.13
text:
May 3, 2018 / 10:59 AM / Updated 7 minutes ago BRIEF-Global Payments Reports Q1 Adjusted Earnings Per Share $1.13 Reuters Staff
May 3 (Reuters) - Global Payments Inc:
* GLOBAL PAYMENTS REPORTS FIRST QUARTER 2018 EARNINGS AND INCREASES 2018 OUTLOOK * Q1 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.13
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.10 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* Q1 REVENUE $795 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $915.9 MILLION * SEES FY 2018 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $5.00 TO $5.20
* SEES 2018 ADJUSTED NET REVENUE PLUS NETWORK FEES TO RANGE FROM $3.90 BILLION TO $3.975 BILLION
* SEES 2018 ADJUSTED OPERATING MARGIN TO EXPAND BY AS MUCH AS 120 BASIS POINTS
* FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $5.06, REVENUE VIEW $3.94 BILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
